name: "Street Rats"
description:
This Tee is one of our personal favs that will be added to next seasons look book. The "Street Rats" tee is a grayscale picee that deals with our up bringing. Childhood is not always what it seems. As we mature into adulthood and look back on our past it looks  as if child is so carefree and "easy" But not all children are bought up that way. The reality of childhood that we are given the circumstaces we recieve. None of us have a choice as to what neighborhood  we grew up in, or who our parents are or are not. With that said we turned to the streets.  We here at we are vapors come from the school of hard knocks, the skateboard lifestyle, & the hardcore survival mentality. Early on we were labeled "Street Rats" as we resorted to running the streets and staying out of our homes as an escape from unmentionable domestic problems. 

We have turned our negativity into a positive project using our skills , talents, and survival tactics to become productive individuals rather than turn us into the very things which brought us down in childhood. 

The front of this tee is a one color emblem of sewer top with our signature W,  the rim  reads "we are vapors street rats union established 2004 in the heart of los angeles county.

On the back is our depiction of a rebellious street rat giving the old fashiond middle finger to all who have doubted, and attempted to bring us down over these last few years.

name: "Just Vape It"
description:
Since the release of this tee we've been asked numerous times "What does this mean" some think its a refernce to drugs, and some just dont get it at all. 

To put it to you plain and simple. In just about every group of friends there is usually some sort of off the wall terminology that only those who belong to that group or click relate to. In our case one of the many catch phrases and sayings we use around here is Vape It.

We put that together with a refernce to nike's famous slogan "Just Do It' and there you have it. This is a fun tee that pokes fun at coorperate footwear, and apparel giant nike.

so

"Just Vape It"

name: "Biters Beware"
description: This has been one of our biggest sellers to date. The "Biters" tee deals with unfortunate uncontrolable reality that once others see that you have become or are becomming successful from an origonal idea or formula there will always be someone out there who will  try to emulate or "Bite" that process.

name: "F*?k Love, Follow Dreams"
description:
This tee is another tee that has proven to be one of our biggest sellers. The origonal relese of this shirt dates back to Winter 07 at  a point where we began to see our dream become a reality,  at that time we also began to realize that if we were going to make this happen certin things needed to be cut from our lives in order to push those dreams even further into reality. 

The ugly truth is that sometimes the most beautiful things in life can become a hinderance. The re-release of this piece came at a time where history began to repeat itself. So we felt it was only right to put it out one more time to keep us reminded of the reason we are here.

name: "Death Life Pain Strife"
description: This is a very bold one color piece that depicts our coat of arms and with a wrap around banner that reads "Death, Life, Pain,Strife" This tee is our depiction of "the struggle" Life is full of soo many great things but to create balance there must always be  pain, and strife. It is unavoidable. However we will continue to move forward though these rough times because we know that sooner or later those good parts that keep us going will come back around at any moment.
